ratings.comment: Told us he would curve the class and then proceeded not to curve, only giving out less than 10% of students As as a result. I no longer trust him at all and will avoid taking classes from him in the future if possible. Was a good lecturer, but I want my grade to reflect my understanding of the material and this wasn't the case.

Aaron's an amazing professor. I had him for EMA 202 and EMA 303, and for both of those classes, he was really good. If you need help, go to his office hours and he will make sure you understand the material. He definitely cares about his students as long as you put some effort. If he's the professor for a class, take him.

Sonny is a fantastic professor. His lectures are super straightforward and makes a really tough class seem very manageable (sometimes even easy). Exams aren't bad at all. If you enroll in SI, you will most likely get no lower than a B. Also has a great sense of humor.
Very manageable class if you attend lectures and do the homework. Willing to help and answer any questions.
Not an easy class, generally. Tests are hard and homeworks are long...
